ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ cups whole meal rye flour
¾ cup filtered or spring water
¾ cup filtered or spring water

cookingTips: Keep the starter at room temperature (65-75°F) for consistent fermentation
Feed the starter daily with equal parts flour and water to maintain vigor
Use filtered or spring water to avoid chlorine, which can inhibit fermentation
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Sourdough starters require patience and consistency. Guide the cook on establishing and maintaining a healthy rye starter, including feeding schedules and fermentation signals.
